column5: Can anyone tell me the cost of an annual non-resident fishing license for use in the Canadian waters of Lake St. Clair. If so, is it in Canadian or US funds ?

Annual non-resident fee is $55 Canadian funds, including GST. This type is for full limit. Also conservation licence available for reduced limit for $33 including GST tax. Regular 7 day lic. $35, 7 day conservation is $21.
I should have said the licence fees are for Ontario and not Canada. Each province would have it's own fee structure.
